comments:
M4

When trying to rename a plugin project I get an error.  The error seems to stem
from JDT code.

The second exception seems to be a follow-up error of the first one (the project
doesn't exist anymore since the renam failed).

The actual exception happens in Text land (tries to add a null listener)

Reproducable when plugin.xml file is open in editor.

Moving to Platform/Text

Simpler test case:
1. open plugin.xml
2. rename it

The problem happened because the text editor is embedded in a multi-page (PDE)
editor and they have different strategies to handle the element rename: the PDE
editor closes (which happens async) and the embedded text editor tries to
updated it's input (also asyc). The latter is done after it has already been
disposed by the multi-page editor's close request.

I've fixed the elementMoved(...) method of the element state changed listener in
AbstractTextEditor and I've also verified that the other element state listener
methods are safe.

Available in builds > 20041222
